main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a bright, stationary object in the sky that suddenly accelerated and disappeared from view near San Angelo, Texas on February 7, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared to be circular in shape and was emitting a steady, bright light.
The object remained stationary for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing.
The behavior of the object is consistent with reports of unidentified aerial phenomena.
No other individuals who sighted the object have been discovered so far.
The report suggests the phenomenon may be attributed to a possible unannounced small satellite similar to Echo 1.
sighted object: a bright, circular object in the sky
